title: An experimental study of public trust in AI chatbots in the public sector
research_description: This study examines public trust in AI chatbots used in the public sector through an experimental design involving surveys conducted in Japan.
research_results: The findings indicate that trust in AI chatbots varies significantly based on demographic factors and previous exposure to AI technologies.
future_research: Further research should explore the long-term effects of chatbot use on public trust and its role in shaping service delivery in different cultural contexts.
